action.action-desc: Ms. Stefanik (for herself, Mr. Crawford, Mr. Nehls, Mr. Balderson, Mr. Baird, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Feenstra, Mrs. Hinson, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. Johnson of South Dakota, Mr. Emmer, and Mrs. Miller of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978 with respect to certain agricultural land transactions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Agriculture Foreign Investment Transparency Act.

section.header: Requirements relating to certain agricultural land transactions

subsection.text: Section 2 of the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978 (7 U.S.C. 3501) is amended by striking , other than a security interest, each place it appears.
Section 7 of the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978 (7 U.S.C. 3506) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking Any report and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this subsection, the Secretary shall make publicly available on the website of the Department each report submitted to the Secretary under section 2 not later than 30 days after the date on which such report is received by the Secretary.

Not later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of this subsection, the Secretary shall make publicly available on the website of the Department each report submitted to the Secretary on or after January 1, 2000.
